name: Change Waker
description:
Embark on a short narrative adventure to help find balance in an archipelago inhabited by adorable creatures.

Gamepad controls:

  • Move - Left stick
  • Camera - Right stick
  • Interact, Sail, Get on the boat - A
  • Get off the boat - B

Keyboard controls:

  • Move - Arrows
  • Camera - Mouse
  • Interact, Sail, Get on the boat - Z
  • Get off the boat - X
